body_html: Possible solution: I had this issue, nvidia-smi was working fine, and it turned out I was placing my device where none existed. I have two environments. One with many GPUs one with just one. Running the code one the single GPU machine but placing the device on position '1' (or any other than '0') gave rise to this error.

body: Possible solution: I had this issue, nvidia-smi was working fine, and it turned out I was placing my device where none existed. I have two environments. One with many GPUs one with just one. Running the code one the single GPU machine but placing the device on position '1' (or any other than '0') gave rise to this error.
